title: Fate/Apocrypha - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Drama   Mystery   Romance   Seinen   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Alternate World   Battle Competition   Folklore   Heroes   Homunculus   Knights   Legends   Male Protagonist   Master-Servant Relationship   Multiple POV   Necromancer   Priests   Servants   Summoned Hero   Summoning Magic   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Trap   Wishes
author: Higashide Yuichiro   Type-Moon
description:
Fate/Apocrypha is a story based around a Holy Grail War separate from that of the five Fuyuki Wars.

The original chapter 1 'Unbirth' focuses on Jack the Ripper. Though elements from this chapter exists in the official story, this chapter is not related to the official plot of the story.>
